MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG7 postcode area of Gatehouse of Fleet. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm to repair a fault on our overhead line network at High Auchenlarie and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:24am on the 19th of March 2021.
